mapper.select: update INSBPlatcarprice set operator = #{operator},modifytime = NOW(),noti = #{noti},taskid = #{taskid},companyid = #{companyid},brandname = #{brandname},newcarprice = #{newcarprice},newcartaxprice = #{newcartaxprice},analogyprice = #{analogyprice},analogytaxprice = #{analogytaxprice},listedyear = #{listedyear},seat = #{seat},unwrtweight = #{unwrtweight},fullweight = #{fullweight},displacement = #{displacement} where id = #{id}
